Source.Summary: MPD is a flexible, powerful, server-side application for playing music.
Source.Description: Music Player Daemon (MPD) is a flexible, powerful, server-side application for playing music. Through plugins and libraries it can play a variety of sound files while being controlled by its network protocol.
